title: Forbidden Devil
description: LincolnIt’s been six years since Jazyln Benson skated out of my life and now that she’s back, I’m determined to make her mine.But things are different this time around.She’s the new owner of the Nashville Devils which makes her my boss. She has the power to destroy my career and being seen with me would destroy hers. She’s the one woman who’s supposed to be off limits. Too bad I can’t get her out of my head.Even if it means risking everything.When it’s time to make the final play, will she take the shot? Or will she leave me out in the cold?JazylnI never expected to inherit a hockey team from my father, but now that I have, all eyes are on me.And they’re all waiting for me to fail.I can’t do anything that compromises my new position, including Lincoln Dallas, newly appointed team captain and blast from the past. As the heat between us becomes impossible to ignore, I find myself giving in. But no one can know.Even if it’s likely we’ll both be burned.When everything is on the line, is he worth sacrificing everything I’ve built? Or will he be the one to skate away?
author: Melissa Ivers
